author: seba.wagner
msg: Issue 371: upload file: bug in conversion
The conversion should now work no matter if you install Red5 in *Program* or *Program Files* (or put any spaces in the installation Path), no matter if its windows or OSx/Linux style.
Its done by writing for every conversion a separate Conversion Script (Shell/Batch).
